summary: **"Tropic Thunder" (2008)** is a funny action movie directed by Ben Stiller. It's about five actors, played by Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr., Jay Baruchel, and Brandon T. Jackson, who are making a fake Vietnam War movie. Their director gets fed up and leaves them in a real jungle, where they must use their acting skills to survive. The film laughs at famous war movies and how actors get into their roles. It was a big hit, making over $195 million worldwide, and Downey Jr. even got an Academy Award nomination for his funny performance.
title: Tropic Thunder
